description:
Improv for Everyone!

Learning improv teaches you how to collaborate better, support everyone you know, and create more ideas.  All of your relationships will marvel with how fun and productive it is just to talk to you!

What’s Inside:

18 Videos showing specific Improv/Teamwork lessons

PowerPoint slides to help you remember each section.

Instructor:

Kelly Ryan, Comedian

Kelly Ryan is a twenty-three year old comedian who performs stand-up, improvisational and sketch comedy. Starting off at the age of seventeen, Kelly took classes and performed at Caroline's in New York City and began her career as a comedian. In college she was a member of the improv troupe, Senseless Acts of Comedy for three and a half years. She also taught the beginner's improv class, Loose Ends, all seven semesters. During her time at school, Kelly opened for SNL's Vanessa Bayer, SNL's Aidy Bryant, The Office's BJ Novak, and Parks and Recreation's Retta.

Course Description:

What do Tina Fey, Will Ferrell, Amy Poehler, and Steve Carrell have in common?  Yes, they are all rich, funny, and famous.  But they also did improv comedy like so many great comics and actors.  Most people think improv is hard.  Honestly, if you don’t know the basic rules of anything, it’s going to be hard!  But Improv isn't only for comedians. Companies have found that when a group can improvise and trust each other, they will generate more ideas and raise productivity levels. Improv for Everyone with Kelly Ryan is going to help accomplish your goals and you won’t have to spend a small fortune.  You also don’t have to drive to some special place to get started.  In the world’s first online course to learn improv and teamwork skills, Kelly will show you the following:

  • Why You Should Know Improv

  • Silencing Your Ego

  • The Basic Rules

  • The Gifts of Improv

  • What to Focus on in Scenes

  • The Highs and Lows of Performances

  • Teamwork Skills
title: A Quick Start Guide to Improv
